controller

Class StrategoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StrategoController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StrategoController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is the controller of the Stratego game.

      • StrategoController

        public StrategoController(boolean team,
                          boolean server,
                          java.lang.String hostName,
                          int port)
        Main constructor.
        Parameters:
        team - True for blue, false for red.
        server - True for server, false for client.
        hostName - Name of host.
        port - Port number.

    • Method Detail

      • getBattleWinner

        private static view.Piece getBattleWinner(view.Piece p1,
                                          view.Piece p2)
        Determines which Piece wins the battle. This method assumes that the battle is a legal move. For example the attacking piece will never be the flag.
        Parameters:
        p1 - The attacking piece.
        p2 - The piece being attacked.
        Returns:
        The Piece that wins the battle, or null if tie.

        public model.StrategoModel getModel()

        Returns:

        public boolean isPlacement()
        Returns true if placement phase, false if not.
        Returns:
        True if placement phase, false if not.

      • setPlacement

        public void setPlacement(boolean placement)
        Sets placement phase status.
        Parameters:
        placement - True if placement phase, false if not.

      • isTurn

        public boolean isTurn()
        Return whether it is currently the players turn to move.
        Returns:
        True if it is the player's turn, false otherwise.

      • isLake

        public boolean isLake(model.Loc loc)
        Checks if current location is a lake.
        Parameters:
        loc - The current location, represented by a Loc object.
        Returns:
        True if current location is a lake, false otherwise.

      • hasPiece

        public boolean hasPiece(model.Loc loc)
        Checks if the current location has a piece or not.
        Parameters:
        loc - The current location, represented by a Loc object.
        Returns:
        True if the current location has a piece, false if not.

      • getMoves

        public java.util.Set<model.Loc> getMoves(model.Loc loc,
                                         boolean fromBin)
        Get the set of moves that can be made by the piece at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location to get moves for, or null for placing a piece.
        fromBin - Whether the piece being moved is coming from the bin or is already on the board.
        Returns:
        Set of moves for the piece.

      • movePiece

        public void movePiece(model.Loc from,
                      model.Loc to)
        Moves piece from a location to another and battles if the new location has an enemy piece.
        Parameters:
        from - The current location, represented by a Loc object.
        to - The new location, represented by a Loc object.

      • placePiece

        public void placePiece(view.Piece piece,
                       model.Loc loc)
        Places piece into a location.
        Parameters:
        piece - The Piece to place.
        loc - The location, represented by a Loc object.

      • battle

        public void battle(view.Piece p1,
                   view.Piece p2)
        Battles two pieces. Two pieces fight, either the attacking piece wins and takes the position of the other piece, or attacker is defeated and removed.
        Parameters:
        p1 - The attacking piece.
        p2 - The piece being attacked.
        See Also:
        getBattleWinner(Piece, Piece)

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Checks if game over. The game is over if a player's flag is stolen or if the player has no movable pieces.
        Returns:
        True if game over, false if not.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(network.StrategoMessage message)
        Send move to other player.
        Parameters:
        message - The message containing movement action.
